alert.note: Alert for Central Brewster County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 6:01PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Brewster County through 645 PM CDT... At 601 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Marathon, or 29 miles southeast of Alpine, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Brewster County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
